subject: Re: [junit] Ordering of tests -- indispensible feature??
msgSnippet: ... A nice addition to the TestRunner would be a button that only re-runs the tests that failed during the previous run. That would make my life better. I
messageBody:
> The only way I can see to satisfy both goals is to allow
> tests to run either from first to last, or from last to
> first.
>
> Any other ideas?

A nice addition to the TestRunner would be a button that only re-runs the
tests that failed during the previous run.
That would make my life better. I think I'll take some time to code it
myself.

---------------
Paolo Perrotta
Bologna, Italy
